overview: Yoko, the only daughter of Pak Pras, a retired soldier, was taken hostage with her school friend, Damar. The hostage taker's demands were to ask for some money from Pras and his members who had previously been involved in a military operation. The anti-terror police are trying to negotiate with the hostage-taker so that there are no victims. The anti-terror police involved Damar's father and the school to launch the negotiation process.
title: Clandestine
